attributes.action: Abolish Income Tax on Gross Earnings of Below £10,000 pa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current taxation system is disproportionate against those who earn and have to survive on £10,000pa gross (before tax) £9,000pa Net (after tax)

Whilst we appreciate that there is help available in other benefits, alas, they are 'means-tested' and woefully complex unless you know what questions to ask at the DSS etc.
